HTMLElementBig.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The <big> HTML deprecated element renders the enclosed text at a font size one level larger than the surrounding text (medium becomes large, for example). The size is capped at the browser's maximum permitted font size.

blockquote.para: Warning: This element has been removed from the specification and shouldn't be used anymore. Use the CSS font-size property to adjust the font size.
